name: Hyperspace Dogfights
description: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. Your jet-craft evolves differently on each mission and becomes stronger and weirder by gathering some of the 250+ items available ingame.
minimum_requirements: OS: At least Windows 7 Processor: 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia Gallium 0.4 NV 106 or better, OpenGL compatible Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Right now the game is not too well optimized for 4k monitors and dual screen setups.
recommended_requirements: OS: At least Windows 8 Processor: 3.2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 710 or better, OpenGL compatible Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Right now the game is not too well optimized for 4k monitors and dual screen setups.
